description: A scheme to promote financial inclusion by providing access to banking services.
benefits: Free Rupay Debit Card with accidental insurance cover (Rs.2 lakh, Rs 1 lakh for accounts opened before 28.08.2018)
Overdraft facility (SBOD) upto Rs. 10,000/- for eligible account holders
Access to PoS machines for cashless purchases
eligibility: Minors are eligible to open accounts under guardianship
Individuals without Officially Valid Documents (OVDs) can open 'Small Accounts'
One person can have only one PMJDY Account
documents: Government ID proofs (Voter Card/PAN Card/Ration card)
Permanent Address proof (Passport/Driving License/Electricity Bill/Telephone Bill/Water Bill)
Filled and Signed PMJDY Account opening form
Any other document as notified by the Central Government
